title: The Ultimate mystery
creator_credit: Hartley Productions, Irving Hartley, Elda Hartley and Harvey F. Bellin
brief_description: Describes a variety of parapsychological phenomena, focusing on experiments with plants and bacteria and investigations of the work of faith healers and acupuncturists.
